column4: hi, i just installed the openssh server but i can't get a command prompt when i shell in to my box.  do i need to configure it to use a different login shell?
why can't i get a command prompt then?
you don't have to reboot.  sudo invoke-rc.d ssh restart, and see if it works
did you restart it, as I told you to?
no, sudo invoke-rc.d ssh restart, like I said
then what do you get when you ssh to your box?
what do you see?  Can you pastebin it?
hitting "enter" doesn't get you a command prompt?
no, it just creates a new line in the terminal screen, but nothing happens
that's quite odd.  I've never seen that happen before.
okay this is weird, hitting ctrl-\ allows me to get a working shell
